title: Russia’s Unsupported ‘Dirty Bomb’ Claims Spread Through Right-Wing U.S. Media
description: Russia’s unsupported claim was portrayed as believable in right-wing American media, and as a warning that could serve to escalate the conflict for Ukraine’s benefit or trigger a world war.
dc:creator: Stuart A. Thompson
media:credit: Russian Defense Ministry Press Service/EPA, via Shutterstock
media:description: A still image taken from a handout video provided by the Russian Defense Ministry shows Igor Kirillov, the head of Russia’s Radiation, Chemical and Biological Protection Forces, on Monday.
